-e ---

𓂧 𓏇 𓇋 𓈇 𓀀 𓏥 | fellow-citizens | δημότης dēmótēs ⇔ community ⇔ demi

the final stage of the egyptian language before its collapse (due to christianity, advantages of the alphabet and systematic baggage of historic ambiguities)
